text: Charles Coates was an archer from Great Britain. He was born on 5 April 1857 and died on 15 February 1922. Coates competed at the 1908 Summer Olympics.Charles CoatesCharles COATES == References == Category:1857 births Category:1922 deaths Category:British archers Category:Olympians for Great Britain Category:English rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from London Category:People from the London Borough of Lambeth
title: Charles Coates
